description: This table contains information about the status of failed faxes from a referral.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NOTIFICATION_ID
columns.description: Holds the unique ID within a referral for a particular referral notification

columns.name: LAST_UPDATED_DTTM
columns.description: This holds the last instant this particular fax line was updated.

columns.name: ATTEMPTS
columns.description: The number of times this fax has been submitted

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Current status of the notification


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Submitted


Printed


Failed


Canceled


Sent Successfully


Sent to Print Job

columns.name: FAILURE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Failure reason for the fax


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Failed in print server


No fax number defined for recipient


Failed in PDF generation


No printer defined for PDF generation


No fax device found for current print class

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The General Use Note (HNO) record that was sent during the letter review process, used to resend the updated letter.

columns.name: FAX_NAME
columns.description: Stores the name of the recipient for a fax. This will be used as the recipient name in the event the failed fax is resent.

columns.name: FAX_NUM
columns.description: Stores the fax number for a fax. This will be used as the fax number in the event the failed fax is resent.

columns.name: FAILURE_ERR_MSG
columns.description: For a failed notification, the error message associated with the failure.
